description: Machine learning based automated text classification library.  Useful for essay scoring and other tasks.  Please see httpsgithub.comedxdiscern for an API wrapper of this code.

info.Keywords:: ml machine learning nlp essay education

longdescription: Machine learning based automated text classification library.  Useful for essay scoring and other tasks.  Please see httpsgithub.comedxdiscern for an API wrapper of this code.
